```{r}
a <- grayscale(boats)
b <- imnoise(dim=dim(a))


r <- function(v) with(FFT(v),sqrt(real^2 + imag^2))
theta <- function(v) with(FFT(v),atan2(imag,real))
synth <- function(r,theta) FFT(r*cos(theta),r*sin(theta),inverse=TRUE)$real
#Original image
synth(r(a),theta(a)) %>% plot
#Random phase
synth(r(a),theta(b)) %>% plot
#Random spectrum
synth(r(b),theta(a)) %>% plot
```
